formatDescription: A Microsoft Access Workgroup Information File stores the usernames and passwords for users and groups that require access to a Microsoft Access database. Compatible with MDB formats (Access 97-2003) rather than the later ACCDB format (Access 2007-2010).
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of Australia / National Library of Australia

internalSignatures.name: Microsoft Access Workgroup Information File
internalSignatures.note: Offset 0-6 Magic Bytes from beginning of file: 'Jet System DB'
